# NSViewAnimation.Key

**Structure**

The following string constants are keys for the dictionaries in the array passed into [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewAnimation/init(viewAnimations:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewAnimation/viewAnimations].

## Declaration

```swift
struct Key
```

## Keys

- **effect**: An effect to apply to the animation.
- **endFrame**: The size and location of the window or view at the end of the animation.
- **startFrame**: The size and location of the window or view at the start of the animation.
- **target**: The target of the animation.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Getting and setting view-animation dictionaries

- **viewAnimations**: The dictionaries defining the objects to animate.
- **NSViewAnimation.EffectName**: The following constants specify the animation effect to apply and are used as values for the animation effect property of the animation view. See the description of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewAnimation/Key/effect] for usage details.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
